Method Detail

getPaths

public List<String> getPaths()
Returns the list of restlets paths. The list is sorted according to the handlers hierarchy.

Specified by:
getPaths in interface RestletCall
Returns:
The list of restlets paths.

getPath

public String getPath(int index,
                      boolean strip)
Returns one of the paths in the list. The first path is the resource path relatively to the current restlet. The second path is the current reslet path relatively to the parent restlet. All the hierarchy of restlet paths is also available depending on the restlet tree.

Specified by:
getPath in interface RestletCall
Parameters:
index - Index of the path in the list.
strip - Indicates if leading and ending slashes should be stripped.
Returns:
The path at the given index.
